chapter.title: System Features
chapter.para: A Bank Administrator is responsible for maintaining not only the processes and parameters required to manage client requests through the portal, but also the client definitions, roles and parameters that determine the way the clients use the portal and the functions available to them.

The System Features functions are used by Bank Administrators to maintain Bank and Client (Customer) details, accounts and parameters. This manual will cover both the Bank Administrator and Bank Group Administrator functions.

note.para: The availability of the System Features menu and its functions is dependent on the roles and permissions assigned to a user. Only those functions the user is authorised to use will be displayed. Contact your system administrator for any permissions related queries.

section.title: System Features Functions
section.para: The System Features menu is selected by clicking System Features from the navigation list on the bank Home page. This will display a menu of functions for selection on the left hand side of the page.
The following functions are available in the System Features navigation menu.

Change Profile
Change the administrators password and security questions.
Jurisdiction Maintenance
Customise the jurisdiction and authorisations used by the bank.
Rates Maintenance
As an administrator at a bank, you use this function to update the exchange rates used for currency conversions and in checking authorisation levels
Customer Maintenance
Maintain customer accounts and logins.
Bank Maintenance
This Bank Maintenance module is available to Bank Group administrators only. Only Bank Groups can create and manage subsidiary banks.
User Maintenance
Maintain Bank user logins.
Alerts Maintenance
Create and maintain alerts for bank notifications, milestones, and other events associated products supplied to customers.
Report Designer
Design and create tailored reports for use by users in the bank.
Parameter Maintenance
Maintain parameters used by the bank and customers in the .
Guarantee Maintenance
Maintain Guarantee parameters used by the bank in the .
Standby LC Maintenance
Maintain Standby LC parameters used by the bank in the .
Facility Maintenance
As an administrator at a bank, you can add a credit facility that banks give their customers and allocate limits across the customer's various branches.
FSCM Program
Programs are created from the Bank side through TI or back office systems and can be viewed by corporate users in portal while raising invoices and requesting for financing.
Biller Maintenance
Maintain Billers defined to the .
License Definition
As an administrator at a bank,you can add license definitions, which will be used by your client users.
CounterParty Maintenance
As an administrator at a bank, you can accept or reject new counterparty created by the customer.
Each of these functions are described in more detail in the following chapters.
